id: Gamified Life Notion System - Say Goodbye to Procrastination!
name: Gamified Life Notion System - Say Goodbye to Procrastination!
description: It's Time to Say Goodbye to Procrastination!Have you ever felt the need to do something but just can't stick to the plan? You knew very well about your goals and what you have to do each day to achieve them but can't find the motivation? You are not alone!We procrastinate because we overthink too much before taking action. While overthinking, we tend to find excuses to justify our inaction, or at the very least, delays in taking action. I used to struggle with procrastination, but ever since I u
